description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace, which declares virtual callback methods for handling various events such as runtime manager events, window manager events, ripple events, and state change events, intended to be implemented by classes that handle these specific event types.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface class that declares callback methods for handling different types of events related to runtime management, window management, ripple events, and state changes.

methods.name: onRuntimeManagerEvent
methods.description: Callback for handling runtime manager related events, receives a JsonObject as data.

methods.name: onWindowManagerEvent
methods.description: Callback for handling window manager related events, receives a JsonObject as data.

methods.name: onRippleEvent
methods.description: Callback for handling ripple events, receives a string name and a JsonObject as data.

methods.name: onStateChangeEvent
methods.description: Callback for handling state change events, receives a JsonObject as data.
